title: cmd/ld: DTrace rejects Go binaries
body:
Old versions of DTrace (like those shipped in OS X and FreeBSD) reject
unicode characters in symbols names.

    $ sudo dtrace -n 'pid$target:a.out::entry' -c `which go`
    dtrace: invalid probe specifier pid$target:a.out::entry: failed to create entry probe for 'main.funcÂ·001': Invalid argument

This problem problem has been fixed in the upstream DTrace implementation
(https://github.com/illumos/illumos-gate/commit/1444d846b126463eb1059a572ff114d51f7562e5)
but it will take years before the fix is available in OS X and FreeBSD. It
would be great if we could avoid putting such characters in symbols.

Discussion at https://groups.google.com/d/topic/golang-dev/4tbtUcF-yCQ/discussion
